hero.title: Transform Passive Learning into Active Retention
hero.description: AI-powered system that automatically converts your YouTube videos, lectures, and articles into personalized flashcards with spaced repetition. Remember what you learn, forever.

betaBanner.earlyAccessDescription: Sign up now and get early access to the platform with exclusive features
betaBanner.validEmailError: Please enter a valid email address
betaBanner.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll be in touch soon.
betaBanner.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

features.title: How It Works
features.description: A simple 3-step process to transform any content into long-term knowledge

extraction.title: AI Concept Extraction
extraction.description: Watch a video or read an article. Our AI automatically extracts key concepts and creates atomic knowledge cards.

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.description: Concepts are matched to your course syllabus with confidence scores. Track exactly what you've learned vs. what's required.

repetition.title: Spaced Repetition
repetition.description: Review flashcards at optimal intervals. Just 3-5 minutes daily ensures long-term retention of everything you learn.

cta.title: Ready to Remember Everything?
cta.description: Join students who are transforming their passive content consumption into active learning

courses.subtitle: Manage your courses and track your learning progress

empty.title: No courses yet
empty.description: Get started by creating your first course. Add your syllabus and start learning with AI-powered flashcards.

concepts.title: Concepts
concepts.description: Concepts linked to this section for the course "{courseName}"
concepts.empty: No concepts directly attached to this subdirectory for this course.

section.title: Concepts & Flashcards
section.description: Click on a concept to view its flashcard

empty.title: No flashcards available yet for this course.
empty.hint: Flashcards will be generated automatically when you upload and process videos.

inbox.description: Drop a URL or file to process content
